description: Enterprise techniques used by Nidiran, ATT&CK software S0118 v1.0
name: Nidiran (S0118)

techniques.comment: Nidiran communicates with its C2 domain over ports 443 and 8443.[2]
Nidiran can create a new service named msamger (Microsoft Security Accounts Manager), which mimics the legitimate Microsoft database by the same name.[3][4]
Nidiran can create a new service named msamger (Microsoft Security Accounts Manager).[3]
Nidiran can download and execute files.[3]
Nidiran uses RC4 to encrypt C2 traffic.[2]
